TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class EventInfo : System.Reflection.MemberInfo, System.Runtime.InteropServices._EventInfo
.class public sequential ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit EventInfo extends System.Reflection.MemberInfo implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._EventInfo
Public MustInherit Class EventInfo Inherits MemberInfo Implements _EventInfo
public ref class EventInfo abstract : System::Reflection::MemberInfo, System::Runtime::InteropServices::_EventInfo
type EventInfo = class inherit MemberInfo interface _EventInfo

summary.span: 发现事件的属性并提供对事件元数据的访问权限。

span.span: Discovers the attributes of an event and provides access to event metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类检查事件，并挂接事件处理程序，如 方法的示例代码中所示。Use the class to inspect events and to hook up event handlers, as shown in the example code for the method. > [!NOTE] > 不应使用 来引发事件。 is not intended to be used to raise events. 对象引发由其内部状态决定的事件。An object raises events as dictated by its internal state. 事件与委托一起使用。Events are used with delegates. 事件侦听器实例化事件处理程序委托，每当事件源引发事件时都会调用该委托。An event listener instantiates an event-handler delegate that is invoked whenever the event is raised by an event source. 为了连接到事件源，事件侦听器会将此委托添加到源的调用列表。In order to connect to the event source, the event listener adds this delegate to the invocation list on the source. 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序委托的 invoke 方法。When the event is raised, the invoke method of the event-handler delegate is called. 支持多播和单强制转换事件通知。Both multicast and single-cast event notifications are supported. `Add` 和 `Remove` 方法以及与事件关联的事件处理程序委托类必须在元数据中标记为。The `Add` and `Remove` methods, as well as the event-handler delegate class associated with an event, must be marked in the metadata. 委托是面向对象的函数指针。Delegates are object-oriented function pointers. 在 C 或C++中，函数指针是对方法的引用。In C or C++, a function pointer is a reference to a method. 与 C 或C++函数指针不同，委托包含两个引用：对方法的引用和对支持方法的对象的引用。In contrast to the C or C++ function pointer, a delegate contains two references: a reference to a method and a reference to an object that supports the method. 委托可以调用方法，而无需知道声明或继承方法的类类型。Delegates can invoke a method without knowing the class type that declares or inherits the method. 委托只需要知道方法的返回类型和参数列表。Delegates need only know the return type and parameter list of the method. 对于单强制转换和多播委托，事件模型同样适用。The event model works equally well for single-cast and multicast delegates. 调用委托的 invoke 方法时，只会有一个对象在其上调用方法。When the delegate's invoke method is called, only a single object will have a method called on it. 多路广播修饰符可应用于委托声明，这允许在调用委托的 invoke 方法时调用多个方法。A multicast modifier can be applied to a delegate declaration, which allows multiple methods to be called when the invoke method of the delegate is called. 当 `GetCustomAttributes` 的 `inherit` 参数为 `true` 时调用 `EventInfo` 上的 不会遍历类型层次结构。Calling on `EventInfo` when the `inherit` parameter of `GetCustomAttributes` is `true` does not walk the type hierarchy. 使用 可继承自定义属性。Use to inherit custom attributes. ## Examples 下面的代码获取 类的 事件的 对象。The following code gets an object for the event of the class. [!code-cpp[type_getevent1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/type_getevent1/CPP/type_getevent1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[type_getevent1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/type_getevent1/CS/type_getevent1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[type_getevent1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/type_getevent1/VB/type_getevent1.vb#1)]

param.name: target
param.span: 事件源。

span.span: The event source.

param.span: 封装当目标引发事件时要调用的方法。

span.span: Encapsulates a method or methods to be invoked when the event is raised by the target.

summary.span: 将事件处理程序添加到事件源。

span.span: Adds an event handler to an event source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法尝试添加委托，以便同步目标对象上的事件。This method attempts to add a delegate to synchronize the event on the target object. 每次由目标参数引发事件时，都将调用该处理程序所封装的方法或方法。Each time the event is raised by the target parameter, the method or methods encapsulated by the handler are invoked. 当您在已编译程序之后加载类型时，您可以使用 `AddEventHandler` 方法，当不能使用C# + = 语法或 Visual Basic `WithEvents` 和 `Handles` 关键字挂钩事件时。You might use the `AddEventHandler` method when you load a type after the program is already compiled, when it is not possible to use the C# += syntax or the Visual Basic `WithEvents` and `Handles` keywords to hook up the event. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 类的实例，使用动态程序集创建一个事件处理程序，并挂钩动态事件处理程序。The following example creates an instance of the class, creates an event handler using a dynamic assembly, and hooks up the dynamic event handler. 所有操作都使用后期绑定来执行。All actions are performed using late binding. 实例存储在 类型的变量中，并且访问 的所有代码都将进行后期绑定。The instance is stored in a variable of type , and all code that accesses the does so late-bound. 该示例使用 方法获取 事件，并使用 属性获取事件的委托类型。The example uses the method to get the event, and the property to get the delegate type for the event. 该示例获取委托类型的 `Invoke` 方法的 ，并获取 实例中的委托的签名。The example gets a for the `Invoke` method of the delegate type and obtains the signature of the delegate from the instance. 然后，该示例创建一个动态程序集，该程序集包含一个模块，其中包含一个名为 "`Handler`" 的类型，并为该类型提供了一个 `static` 方法（Visual Basic 中的`Shared` 方法 `DynamicHandler`），用于处理事件。The example then creates a dynamic assembly with one module containing a single type named `Handler` and gives the type a `static` method (`Shared` method in Visual Basic) named `DynamicHandler` that handles the event. 创建动态类型后，该示例将获取完成方法的 ，并使用它来创建委托实例。After the dynamic type is created, the example gets a for the finished method and uses it to create a delegate instance. 此实例被传递到 方法，以与事件挂钩。This instance is passed to the method to hook up the event. 然后，程序将暂停，以允许引发事件。The program then pauses to allow the event to be raised. [!code-csharp[AddEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddEventHandler/cs/source.cs)] [!code-vb[AddEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddEventHandler/vb/source.vb)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性来发现事件的委托类型并显示其参数类型。The following example uses the property to discover the delegate type of an event and to display its parameter types. 该示例定义一个名为 `MyDelegate` 的委托和一个 `MyDelegate`类型的名为 `ev` 的事件。The example defines a delegate named `MyDelegate` and an event named `ev` of type `MyDelegate`. `Main` 方法中的代码通过获取事件的委托类型，获取委托类型的 `Invoke` 方法，然后检索并显示参数来发现事件签名。The code in the `Main` method discovers the event signature by getting the delegate type of the event, getting the `Invoke` method of the delegate type, and then retrieving and displaying the parameters. [!code-cpp[eventarg#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventArg/CPP/eventarg.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[eventarg#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventArg/CS/eventarg.cs#1)] [!code-vb[eventarg#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventArg/VB/eventarg.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回在元数据中使用 指令与事件相关联的公共方法。

span.span: Returns the public methods that have been associated with an event in metadata using the directive.

returns.span: 一个数组，表示在元数据中通过使用 指令与事件相关联的公共方法。

span.span: An array representing the public methods that have been associated with the event in metadata by using the directive.

returns.span: 如果没有此类公共方法，则返回空数组。

span.span: If there are no such public methods, an empty array is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件的元数据可以将四种类型的方法与事件相关联：The metadata for an event can associate four kinds of methods with the event: - `.addon` 指令指定用于添加事件处理程序的方法。The `.addon` directive specifies the method used to add event handlers. 使用 方法检索该方法的 。Use the method to retrieve an for that method. - `.removeon` 指令指定用于分离事件处理程序的方法。The `.removeon` directive specifies the method used to detach event handlers. 使用 方法检索该方法的 。Use the method to retrieve an for that method. - `.fire` 指令指定用于引发事件的方法。The `.fire` directive specifies the method used to raise the event. 使用 方法检索该方法的 。Use the method to retrieve an for that method. - `.other` 指令指定与事件关联的任何其他方法。The `.other` directive specifies any other methods associated with the event. 使用 方法检索这些方法的 对象的数组。Use the method to retrieve an array of objects for those methods. 使用 `.other` 指令与事件关联的方法对运行时没有特别的意义。The methods associated with an event using the `.other` directive have no special significance to the runtime. C#和 Visual Basic 编译器不使用 `.other` 指令。The C# and Visual Basic compilers do not use the `.other` directive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件的元数据可以将四种类型的方法与事件相关联：The metadata for an event can associate four kinds of methods with the event: - `.addon` 指令指定用于添加事件处理程序的方法。The `.addon` directive specifies the method used to add event handlers. 使用 方法检索该方法的 。Use the method to retrieve an for that method. - `.removeon` 指令指定用于分离事件处理程序的方法。The `.removeon` directive specifies the method used to detach event handlers. 使用 方法检索此方法的 。Use the method to retrieve an for this method. - `.fire` 指令指定用于引发事件的方法。The `.fire` directive specifies the method used to raise the event. 使用 方法检索此方法的 。Use the method to retrieve an for this method. - `.other` 指令指定与事件关联的任何其他方法。The `.other` directive specifies any other methods associated with the event. 使用 方法检索这些方法的 对象的数组。Use the method to retrieve an array of objects for those methods. 使用 `.other` 指令与事件关联的方法对运行时没有特别的意义。The methods associated with an event using the `.other` directive have no special significance to the runtime. C#和 Visual Basic 编译器不使用 `.other` 指令。The C# and Visual Basic compilers do not use the `.other` directive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通常为用C# `event` 关键字或 Visual Basic `Event` 关键字声明的事件返回 `null`。This method usually returns `null` for events declared with the C# `event` keyword or the Visual Basic `Event` keyword. 这是因为和C# Visual Basic 编译器在默认情况下不生成此类方法。This is because the C# and Visual Basic compilers do not generate such a method by default.

span.span: if this event has a special name; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定事件名称是否具有特殊意义。This property determines whether the event's name has a special meaning. 以或开头的名称包含下划线字符（_）、属性访问器和运算符重载方法是可能需要某些编译器特殊处理的名称的示例。Names that begin with or contain an underscore character (_), property accessors, and operator overloading methods are examples of names that might require special treatment by some compilers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将重写 。This property overrides . 因此，在检查一组 对象（例如， 返回的数组）时， 属性仅在给定成员是事件时才返回 。Therefore, when you examine a set of objects - for example, the array returned by - the property returns only when a given member is an event.

summary.span: 从事件源中删除事件处理程序。

span.span: Removes an event handler from an event source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法尝试删除可能在目标对象上同步此事件的委托。This method attempts to remove the delegate that may synchronize this event on the target object. 当某个事件由目标引发时，将不再调用 `handler` 封装的方法。When an event is raised by target, the method or methods encapsulated by `handler` will no longer be invoked.
